緧字的基本解释

緧
qiū
古同“鞧”。

緧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiū］
［《廣韻》七由切，平尤，清。］
(1)驾车时络于牛、马尾下的革带。
(2)收紧。参见“緧縮”。
(3)通“鞦”。

緧字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緧； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页931第06
【廣韻】七由切【集韻】【韻會】雌由切【正韻】此由切，?音秋。【說文】馬紂也。【玉篇】牛馬緧。亦作鞧䋺。【周禮·冬官考工記·輈人】不援其邸，必緧其牛後。　又【集韻】字秋切，音酋。義同。

考證：〔【周禮·冬官考工記·輈人】不緩其邸，必緧其牛後。〕　謹照原文不緩改不援。
緧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
緧字的起名意思

暂无。

緧
Basic explanation of words
緧
qiū
Ancient Tong "鞧".
緧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiū］
["Guangyun" Qiyouqie, Pingyou, Qing. ]
(1) The leather belt that is wrapped around the tails of cattle and horses when driving.
(2) Tighten up. See "shrinking".
(3) Through "autumn".
緧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　緧; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 931 06
[Guang Yun] Qiyouqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Female Youqie【Zhengyun】This Youqie,? Yinqiu. 【Said the text】Ma Zhou also. [Jade articles] cattle and horses. Also known as Qian Yu. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Yi Ren】If you don’t assist his mansion, he must be the queen of the cow.　[Jiyun] The word Qiuqie, the sound chief. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Yi Ren] Don’t delay his residence, he must be the queen of the cattle. 〕　I would like to follow the original text without delay or assistance.
